text: 9:27 Gumazir Dapaniba 2:18; 3:8-9; Onger Akaba 106:44Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ apanibar amamangatɨzɨ, me iza me mɨsogha me gafiragha paza me gamua mɨzazim me ganɨngi. Ezɨ gɨn men osɨmtɨzimɨn aven, inazir afeziar kaba uarir akurvaghasa nɨn diava arai. Ezɨ nɨ uan Nguibamɨn ikia men dɨmdiam baragha, men apangkuvigha akurvazir gumazir maba amadazɨ, me apaniba batoke.
